cards.title: Saskatchewan With Above Average Emissions
cards.body: Saskatchewan’s emissions per capita are the highest in Canada at 55.9 tonnes of CO2e– 216% above the national average of 17.7 tonnes per capita.

cards.title: Only 9% Of Canadians Recycle
cards.body: Canadians throw away over 3 million tonnes of plastic waste every year. Only 9% is recycled while the rest ends up in our landfills, waste-to-energy facilities or the environment. Plastic waste and marine litter burdens our economy and threatens the health of the environment including wildlife, rivers, lakes and oceans.
